name: TheBangladeshToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Bangladesh Today is one of the most popular English national daily newspaper, which is serving the nation for decades. 

This Alexa skill will aggregate the latest news update from the The Bangladesh Today website.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
